page.title: 11MARYKIRK CHURCH 2
page.content: Few people attend Marykirk Church. Those who do attend are mostly older people though some new families have joined recently. During the Sunday Service, after the second hymn, the Sunday School children go through to the Sunday School room where the teacher reads a story and the children work at different activities. The Women's Guild members come from Luthermuir and Marykirk. Mr Blaikie came in 1979. He visits people in their homes especially if they are ill. During the year he holds special services for Christmas, Easter, Harvest, Communion and officiates at christenings, weddings and funerals.
